Articles.Content:
Well I spent a long long time putting struts on my ship. I decided to save the whole lower section as a sub assembly. So I disconnect the ship from below the command pod and drag it to sub assembly, of course after that I have to drag it back to recreate the ship again. The problem is when I reconnected the lower half of the ship the vast majority of my pain staking strut placement has disappeared

Edited January 5, 2014 by steelgrey

No, there's no fix. That I'm aware of. And it's not just you

also painstaking is one word.
Okay so this time it is actually a bug and not me doing something wrong again. Cheers.
